    Function reference

    All functions

    age_risk()
    Returns the probability mass function of being infected given age and gender
    auto_endemic_channel()
    Returns an automated endemic channel of a disease
    describe_ethnicity()
    Provides the sociological description of ethnicities in Colombia
    describe_occupation()
    Get ISCO-88 occupation labels from codes
    detect_outbreaks_ewma()
    Detects Outbreaks with SPC schemes
    distance_matrix
    distance_matrix
    divipola_table
    divipola_table
    endemic_channel()
    Returns the endemic channel of a disease
    endemic_outliers()
    Modifies the historic incidence to handle with the observations of epidemic years
    endemic_plot()
    Creates the endemic channel plot
    epiCo-population-data
    population_projection_col
    epiCo-spatial-data
    spatial_polygons_col
    epi_calendar()
    Get the epidemiological calendar of a consulted year.
    ewma()
    Returns the EWMA smoothed of a vector
    geom_mean()
    Returns the geometric mean of a vector of real numbers.
    incidence_rate()
    Extends an incidence class object with incidence rates estimations.
    isco88_table
    isco88_table
    morans_index()
    Calculate spatial correlation of given municipalities in an incidence_rate object.
    neighborhoods()
    Neighborhoods from real travel distances
    population_projection_col_1 population_projection_col_2
    Department population projection
    population_projection_col_0
    Colombian population projection
    population_pyramid()
    Returns the population pyramid of the consulted region
    spatial_polygons_col_0 spatial_polygons_col_1 spatial_polygons_col_2
